name: Julie Shiels
biography:
Julie Shiels is a writer and visual artist who has spent much of her professional life working with communities. In 1995 she started working with the Timorese community and 'dreams of return' documents much of the work made on this journey.
Julie is also known for her work with Experimenta on the 'memory packs' project and website. In 2002/3 Julie was creative director, writer and artist for a major public arts project. 'memories and markers' is a series of artworks throughout the City of Port Phillip that mark people's memories about place.
